| area_code_type = | area_code = | iso_code = | website = | footnotes = }} Payari is a village in Bangladesh. It is in the Magura district of the Khulna Division. It is almost away from Magura Sadar Upazila. The Nabaganga river flows nearby the village. == References == Category:Villages in Asia Category:Khulna Division
